name: Kinich
title: Turnfire Hunt
description: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

normal.2: After using his Elemental Skill "Canopy Hunter: Riding High"'s mid-air swing attack, he can perform a mid-air Normal Attack before landing.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount to spin and throw his Claymore forward to attack opponents.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Kinich uses his big-game hunting skills to either move swiftly or attack his opponent.
description.1: When no opponents are nearby, he fires a grappling hook forward and swings in mid-air, and this Skill's CD decreases by 60%. When an opponent is present, he will fire the hook at the target opponent and enter Nightsoul's Blessing at 0 Nightsoul points.
description.2: Can be Held. When Held, he can aim the grappling hook.
description.5: Kinich's Nightsoul's Blessing lasts 10s and generates 2 Nightsoul points every second.
description.6: In this state, Kinich will hook onto a nearby opponent and perform a variable attack:
7: Using a Normal Attack will perform loop shots around the grapple target based on current movement direction, dealing <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> with the Nightsoul attribute and generating 3 Nightsoul points. Loop shot DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

When Nightsoul points are at max, he can use the Elemental Skill "Scalespiker Cannon": Consume all Nightsoul points to deal <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> with the Nightsoul attribute. When "Scalespiker Cannon" is held, Kinich can take aim at his target. After firing the Cannon, Kinich will try to grapple to its target.
description.8: While in Nightsoul's Blessing, Kinich will generate a Blind Spot beside an opponent he has grappled to or fired the Cannon at. When he enters this Blind Spot, it will be canceled, and Kinich will gain 4 Nightsoul points.
description.9: If the grapple connection should snap due to exceeded distance or some other reason, using a Normal Attack will establish a new connection with a nearby opponent before performing loop shots.
description.11: "All things come with a cost. I suggest you make a suitable offer... What? No, I don't do installments."

description.0: Unleashes the power of Ajaw the Almighty Dragonlord (on a limited, conditional, restricted, contractual, partial, temporary basis), dealing <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro> that has the Nightsoul attribute. Ajaw will unleash his dragon-breath at intervals, dealing <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro> that has the Nightsoul attribute.
description.1: If Kinich is in Nightsoul's Blessing when this is used, this Blessing's duration is extended by 2s.
description.3: "Yes, yes! You stand before K'uhul Ajaw the Almighty Dragonlord! Come forward, then! Kneel, and kiss our feet!"

description.0: When in Nightsoul's Blessing, opponents hit by Kinich's Elemental Skill DMG will enter the Desolation state, and when affected by Burning or Burgeon reaction DMG, they will restore 7 Nightsoul points to him. Nightsoul points can be gained this way once every 0.8s. The Desolation state will persist until this instance of Kinich's Nightsoul's Blessing ends.

When a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, Kinich will gain 1 stack of Hunter's Experience that lasts 15s, max 2 stacks. When Kinich uses Canopy Hunter: Riding High's Scalespiker Cannon, all stacks will be consumed, with each stack increasing the DMG dealt by this Cannon shot by 320% of Kinich's ATK.

passive3.name: Night Realm's Gift: Repaid in Full

description.0: When Kinich is in the air following Canopy Hunter: Riding High's mid-air swing, he can consume 10 Phlogiston points to perform another mid-air swing.
description.1: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, he can use Nightsoul Transmission: Kinich. When the current active character is sprinting, in movement states that result from specific Talents, or a certain height in the air, switching to Kinich will trigger the following: Kinich will fire a grappling hook and swing. Kinich will prioritize valid Coilgrass Sigils as grapple targets. He can use Nightsoul Transmission once every 10s.
description.2: When interacting with Coilgrass Sigils and other items that can interact with Yumkasaurs, "Canopy Hunter: Riding High" will be converted to "Yumkasaur Mimesis," which causes interactions with such items to follow rules applicable to Yumkasaurs, and which will not put Canopy Hunter: Riding High on CD.

description.0: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, your own party members' Movement SPD is increased by 15% for 10s. Additionally, the location of items unique to Natlan will appear on your mini-map.
After Kinich lands from Canopy Hunter: Riding High's mid-air swing, his Movement SPD will increase by 30% for 6s.
description.1: Additionally, Scalespiker Cannon's CRIT DMG is increased by 100%.

description.0: When Kinich's Elemental Skill hits opponents, it will decrease their <dendro>Dendro RES</dendro> by 30% for 6s.
description.1: Additionally, the first Scalespiker Cannon Kinich fires after entering Nightsoul's Blessing has increased AoE, and its DMG increases by 100%.

description.0: Increases the Level of Canopy Hunter: Riding High by 3.
When in Nightsoul's Blessing, Kinich will restore 5 Energy after using his loop shots or after unleashing the Scalespiker Cannon. Energy regeneration can happen this way once every 2.8s.
description.1: Additionally, Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord deals 70% more DMG.

description.0: Increases the Level of Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord by 3.
After Scalespiker Cannon hits an opponent, it will bounce once between opponents, dealing 700% of Kinich's ATK as <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro>.
description.1: If this Scalespiker Cannon triggers the buffs that Passive Talent "Flame Spirit Pact" or the Constellation "Tiger Beetle's Palm" grant to the Cannon, the bouncing attack will also obtain the relevant buffs.
